on_start_text: Hi, I'm a mentor search bot! Upload your resume or fill out a questionnaire so that our neural network can find you a mentor
start_text: Hello! Please select the stack you are interested in
no_mentors_text: Unfortunately, there are no mentors in this specialization at the moment
specific_speciality_text: Write a specialization to find out about mentors
quizz_0: In order for us to find you a mentor, please answer a few questions. If you are ready, send the word 'ok' in response to this message
quizz_1: What specific skills or knowledge do you want to develop?
quizz_2: What is your work experience in this field?
quizz_3: What technologies do you already know at an advanced user level?
quizz_4: Availability and work format: What form of mentoring suits you best (online, offline, combined format)?
quizz_5: What is your budget for mentoring?
did_you_choose_mentor: In the previous message, I sent a list of mentors, did you like any of them?
thanks_for_answers:
Thank you!  We would be very grateful if you send feedback after talking to the mentor! 
 Be sure to specify the mentor's nickname in the message
give_me_a_second: File uploaded successfully, give me a little time to process
error_getting_reviews_text: It seems there was an error getting reviews.
regret_mentors_not_found_text: Unfortunately, there are no mentors for your request at the moment. Try changing the search criteria
end_of_quizz_text: Thank you for your answers! Give me a little time, I will find a suitable mentor!
ask_for_mentor_name_text: Please write the name and nickname of the mentor
regret_text: I'm sorry! Let's look for more! Choose a mentor from the list
did_not_understend_text: I'm sorry, I didn't understand your answer. Please try again.
download_yuor_cv_text: Just upload your resume in .docx or .pdf format
